name: The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 1
name_original: The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 1
description:
The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 1 is a game developed by multiplegamesman. It came out on 02-02-2021.
The Dark Truth Of P.S. 38 Part 1 is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. The game is sold via itch.io.
